text: Allah‌ra pratisruti o manusera pratisrutira ba'ire yekhane'i taderake pa'oya geche sekhane'i tara lanchita hayeche. Ara tara allah‌ra krodhera patra hayeche ebam tadera upara daridra nirdharana kare deya hayeche. Eta e jan'ye ye, tara allah‌ra ayatasamuhera sathe kuphari karata ebam an'yayabhabe nabiganake hatya karata; ta ejan'ya ye, tara abadhya hayechila ebam simalanghana karata
